feed.title: Paperless GPT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Prompt templating enhancements
entry.content:
Prompt templating enhancements

  • You can now pass in the existing title to the title prompt.
  • Better documentation of available variables for prompt templating in the README

What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update actions/cache action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/142
  • chore(deps): update docker/build-push-action action to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/144
  • chore(deps): update docker/setup-buildx-action action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/146
  • chore(deps): update docker/login-action action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/145
  • chore(deps): update docker/setup-qemu-action action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/153
  • Make the existing document title available in prompt template. by @IngmarStein in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/158
  • feat: add correspondent prompt template and update title parameter in… by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/159

New Contributors

  • @IngmarStein made their first contribution in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/158

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.9.1...v0.9.2

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: TOKEN_LIMIT to rule your LLM
entry.content:
Hey!

Now you can use TOKEN_LIMIT optionally to trim the length of the LLM input. This will enable better performance for smaller models.

What's Changed

  • feat: add TOKEN_LIMIT environment variable for controlling maximum to… by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/161
  • feat: update Docker workflow to build and push AMD64 and ARM64 images… by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/172

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.9.2...v0.10.0

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Pagination for history
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Implement pagination for modification history retrieval and update fr… by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/162
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-router-dom to v6.29.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/168
  • chore(deps): update dependency go to v1.23.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/155
  • chore(deps): update react monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/79
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/143
  • chore(deps): update dependency @playwright/test to v1.50.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/175
  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/node to v22.13.0 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/149
  • fix(deps): update dependency @heroicons/react to v2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/92
  • chore(deps): update eslint monorepo to v9.19.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/87
  • chore(deps): update golang docker tag to v1.23.5 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/152
  • chore(deps): update dependency node-fetch to v3.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/176
  • fix: update Docker image tag logic for pull requests and tags by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/177
  • chore(deps): update dependency typescript-eslint to v8.22.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/86

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.10.0...v0.10.1

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Embed web app into binary (and updates)
entry.content:

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.10.3
entry.content:
What's Changed
